summary: Comprehensive testing of FOTIVA photography management system completed successfully. Backend API testing achieved 100% success rate (18/18 tests passed). Frontend testing verified landing page functionality, chatbot FAQ, corrected sidebar, navigation between pages, login flow, and mobile responsiveness.
